mapper.sql: FPUID, UserID, FPid, FProductsName, FProductsRates, FProductsBuyMoney, FProductsBuyTime, FProductsRateInNum, FProductsExtractNum, FProductsOutMoney, FProductsCountNum, FProductsRateMoney, FProductsCountRateMoney, MemberRates
FProductsEm_k1, FProductsEm_k2, FProductsEm_k3, FProductsEm_k4, FProductsEm_k5, FProductsImgs
mapper.select: select a.TrueName ,a.UserName,b.FProductsBuyMoney,b.FProductsBuyTime from accounts_users a, financeproducts_users b where a.UserID = b.UserID and b.fPid=#{fPid} order by b.FProductsBuyTime DESC
select count(userId) from financeproducts_users where FPid = #{FPid}
mapper.insert: insert into financeproducts_users (FPUID, UserID, FPid, FProductsName, FProductsRates, FProductsBuyMoney, FProductsBuyTime, FProductsRateInNum, FProductsExtractNum, FProductsOutMoney, FProductsCountNum, FProductsRateMoney, FProductsCountRateMoney, MemberRates, FProductsEm_k1, FProductsEm_k2, FProductsEm_k3, FProductsEm_k4, FProductsEm_k5, FProductsImgs) values (#{fpuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{fpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fproductsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fproductsrates,jdbcType=REAL}, #{fproductsbuymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fproductsbuytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fproductsrateinnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fproductsextractnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fproductsoutmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, #{fproductscountnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fproductsratemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{fproductscountratemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{memberrates,jdbcType=REAL}, #{fproductsemK1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fproductsemK2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fproductsemK3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fproductsemK4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fproductsemK5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fproductsimgs,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY})

update financeproducts_users
UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR},
FPid = #{fpid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FProductsName = #{fproductsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FProductsRates = #{fproductsrates,jdbcType=REAL},
FProductsBuyMoney = #{fproductsbuymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FProductsBuyTime = #{fproductsbuytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FProductsRateInNum = #{fproductsrateinnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FProductsExtractNum = #{fproductsextractnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FProductsOutMoney = #{fproductsoutmoney,jdbcType=REAL},
FProductsCountNum = #{fproductscountnum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FProductsRateMoney = #{fproductsratemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
FProductsCountRateMoney = #{fproductscountratemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MemberRates = #{memberrates,jdbcType=REAL},
FProductsEm_k1 = #{fproductsemK1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FProductsEm_k2 = #{fproductsemK2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FProductsEm_k3 = #{fproductsemK3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FProductsEm_k4 = #{fproductsemK4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FProductsEm_k5 = #{fproductsemK5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FProductsImgs = #{fproductsimgs,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY},
where FPUID = #{fpuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update financeproducts_users set UserID = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, FPid = #{fpid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FProductsName = #{fproductsname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FProductsRates = #{fproductsrates,jdbcType=REAL}, FProductsBuyMoney = #{fproductsbuymoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FProductsBuyTime = #{fproductsbuytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FProductsRateInNum = #{fproductsrateinnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FProductsExtractNum = #{fproductsextractnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FProductsOutMoney = #{fproductsoutmoney,jdbcType=REAL}, FProductsCountNum = #{fproductscountnum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FProductsRateMoney = #{fproductsratemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FProductsCountRateMoney = #{fproductscountratemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MemberRates = #{memberrates,jdbcType=REAL}, FProductsEm_k1 = #{fproductsemK1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FProductsEm_k2 = #{fproductsemK2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FProductsEm_k3 = #{fproductsemK3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FProductsEm_k4 = #{fproductsemK4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FProductsEm_k5 = #{fproductsemK5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FProductsImgs = #{fproductsimgs,jdbcType=LONGVARBINARY} where FPUID = #{fpuid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
